item.description: code_verifier=dBjftJeZ4CVP-mB92K27uhbUJU1p1r_wW1gFWFOEjXk code_challenge=E9Melhoa2OwvFrEMTJguCHaoeK1t8URWbuGJSstw-cM https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7636 Swift import CryptoKit let codeVerifier = "dBjftJeZ4CVP-mB92K27uhbUJU1p1r_wW1gFWFOEjXk" let data = Data(codeVerifier.utf8) let hash = SHA256.hash(data: data) let codeChallenge = Data(hash).base64EncodedString() .replacingOccurrences(of: "=", with: "") .replacingOccurrences(of: "+", with: "-") .replacingOccurrences(of: "/", with: "_") Ruby require 'base64' require 'digest' code_verifier = "dBjftJeZ4CVP-mB92K27uhbUJU1p1r_wW1gFWFOEjXk" code_challenge = Base64.urlsafe_encode64(Digest::SHA256.digest(code_verifier), padding: false) æœ€åˆã€ãƒãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥å€¤ã‚’æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã§æ‰±ã£ã¦å°‘ã—ãƒãƒã£ãŸã‘ã© CommonCrypto ã‚’ä½¿ã‚ãšã«ã§ãã¦ã‚ˆã‹ã£ãŸ ğŸ‰

item.title: Appleã§ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã¨ãƒªãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã®å–å¾—
item.description: Appleã§ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³æ¤œè¨¼ã®ç¶šãã€‚ ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ— # Gemfile gem "jwt" # ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰é€ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ããŸãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ code = "authorizationCode" # ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã®IDï¼ˆdecoded_token[:aud]ï¼‰ client_id = "com.example.app" # https://developer.apple.com/account/#/membership team_id = "xxx" # https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/authkeys/list key_id = "xxx" key_file = File.read(Rails.root.join("AuthKey_xxx.p8")) key = OpenSSL::PKey::EC.new(key_file) access_token/refresh_token ã®å–å¾— headers = { kid: key_id, alg: "ES256" } claims = { iss: team_id, sub: client_id, iat: Time.now.to_i, exp: Time.now.to_i + 1.day.to_i * 180, aud: "https://appleid.apple.com" } client_secret = JWT.encode claims, key, "ES256", headers params = { client_id: client_id, client_secret: client_secret, code: code, grant_type: "authorization_code" } response = Net::HTTP.

item.title: Appleã§ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³æ¤œè¨¼
item.description: ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ— # Gemfile gem "jwt" # ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰é€ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ããŸãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ token = "identityToken" code = "authorizationCode" ç½²åæ¤œè¨¼ url = "https://appleid.apple.com/auth/keys" jwks = JSON.parse(open(url).read, symbolize_names: true) algorithms = jwks[:keys].map { |key| key[:alg] } # or tokenã®Headerã®:alg decoded_token = JWT.decode(token, nil, true, algorithms: algorithms, jwks: jwks).first.with_indifferent_access # 1ã¤ã®JWKã ã‘æ¤œè¨¼ã—ãŸã„ã¨ã jwk = jwks[:keys].first public_key = JWT::JWK.import(jwk).keypair.public_key # or `JWT::JWK::RSA.import(jwk).public_key` JWT.decode(token, public_key, true, algorithm: "RS256") # æœŸé™ã¯10åˆ†ãªã®ã§æ³¨æ„ JWT.decode(...) #=> JWT::ExpiredSignature: Signature has expired authorizationCodeã®æ¤œè¨¼ # https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#CodeValidation digest = Digest::SHA256.
